experience.title: Kantega

experience.title: NorgesGruppen Data AS
experience.description: Worked on B2B applications as a Systems Architect to support automatic store replenishement of norways largest retailer within food and groceries. Technical leadership of two seperate teams encompassing a total of 11 team mates.

experience.title: NorgesGruppen Data AS
experience.description: Worked as a temporary employee (60-100%)over Christmas 2004 as a J2EE developer. Tasks included assessment and comparison of web-based frameworks for writing reusable web components in an existing application, as well as outlining a migration path from their existing approach to the recommended framework.

experience.title: Haagen Software AS
experience.description: Founder, Owner and Software Developer at Haagen Software AS.

projects.title: IT Achitect, Software Developer
projects.description: Development lead for an application for analyzing oil spill for creating risk assessments and oil spill contingency analysis and planning.

projects.title: Software Developer, IT Performance Architect
projects.description: Systems Developer (11 months), IT Perfomance Architect (2 months) on the Norwegian Public Service Pension Funds PERFORM project. Took part of development for a new case work system on a new technology platform for the introduction of the new pension scheme on 01.01.2011.
projects.client: The Norwigina Public Service Pension Fund

projects.title: Software Developer iOS (Kantega Quiz)
projects.description: Systems Developer (2 months, part time), Development of the iOS application Katega Quiz, used as a question-and-answer application for Kantega at various events.

opensource.title: EurekaJ
opensource.description: Design and development the Open Source Profiler tool for Java Applications, EurekaJ. EurekaJ integrates with BTrace from Oracle (also Open Source) in order to provide the user with detailed metrics regarding the operation of any Java Application in either Development, Test or in Production.

opensource.title: BTrace
opensource.description: BTrace is a safe, dynamic tracing tool for the Java platform. BTrace can be used to dynamically trace a running Java program (similar to DTrace for OpenSolaris applications and OS).

opensource.title: JSFlot
opensource.description: Development of an open source JavaServer Faces charting library. Hosted at Google Code, under the MIT license.
